1162160.name: American Truck Simulator - Pink Ribbon Charity Pack
1162160.description:
Pink ribbons, and the colour pink in general, are most commonly seen during the (International) Breast Cancer Awareness Month, an annual health campaign organised by major breast cancer charities every October to increase awareness and raise funds to fight the disease.

Inspired by truck manufacturers and truckers from around the world, we are proud to be joining the Pink Ribbon Breast Cancer Awareness campaign!

SCS Software will be donating 100% of its Pink Ribbon Charity Pack proceeds to reputable Breast Cancer research and awareness charities, starting with the charities listed below.

We hope that the list of charities we contribute to will grow as we collect more money over time.

Supported Charities


The BCRF – Breast Cancer Research Foundation USA is a nonprofit organization committed to achieving prevention and a cure for breast cancer. It provides critical funding for cancer research worldwide to fuel advances in tumor biology, genetics, prevention, treatment, metastasis and survivorship. The mission of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation is to prevent and cure breast cancer by advancing the world's most promising research.

The Alliance of Women with Breast Cancer (Aliance žen s rakovinou prsu) is a nonprofit organisation, founded in the Czech Republic by cancer patients. It provides an education centre open to the public and those affected by breast cancer, and offers methodological assistance to similar organisations and assists in advocacy campaigns to treat and prevent breast cancer. It also plays an active role in representing the rights of breast cancer patients in the fields of treatment and recovery.
